about:
Lions Club of Bangalore Prerana *(District 317-E)* is a part of Lions Clubs International, chartered in March 2022 by Lion Sowmya B. A. as its charter president.

The club was chartered with a team of 21 members who aspire to serve the less fortunate within the local community and to maintain a clean and green environment. The focus areas of the team are 

* Environment
* Health
* Education and awareness program
* Empowering women and children with skill-based training programs
* Vocational training programs to build economic foundation
* Care for the aged and disabled

officers.name: Lion Dr. Shiva Shankar G. N.
officers.title: Ⅰ Vice President
